tables.name: ApiTokens
tables.description: Stores API tokens used for authentication and authorization purposes

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the API token

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the API token

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the API token

fields.name: Key
fields.description: API key value

fields.name: Secret
fields.description: API secret value

fields.name: ExpireAt
fields.description: Expiration date and time of the API token

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: Indicates if the API token is enabled

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the API token

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the API token was created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the API token

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the API token was last modified

tables.name: ApiTokenPolicies
tables.description: Stores policies associated with API tokens, defining access permissions

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the policy

fields.name: ApiTokenId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the associated API token
constraints: FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES ApiTokens(Id) ON DELETE CASCADE

fields.name: Area
fields.description: Area or scope of the policy

fields.name: Actions
fields.description: Actions allowed by this policy

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the global settings

fields.name: SuperAdmins
fields.description: Comma-separated list of super administrator user identifiers

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the global settings

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the global settings were created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the global settings

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the global settings were last modified

tables.name: PluginDefinitions
tables.description: Stores definitions for available plugins in the system

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the plugin definition

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the plugin

fields.name: Category
fields.description: Category of the plugin

fields.name: Assembly
fields.description: Assembly name where the plugin is implemented

fields.name: Icon
fields.description: Icon identifier for the plugin

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the plugin

fields.name: Stylesheets
fields.description: Stylesheets associated with the plugin

fields.name: Locked
fields.description: Indicates if the plugin definition is locked

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the plugin definition

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the plugin definition was created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the plugin definition

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the plugin definition was last modified

tables.name: PluginDefinitionTypes
tables.description: Stores types associated with plugin definitions

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the plugin definition type

fields.name: PluginDefinitionId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the associated plugin definition
constraints: FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES PluginDefinitions(Id) ON DELETE CASCADE

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the plugin definition type

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Type identifier

fields.name: IsDefault
fields.description: Indicates if this is the default type for the plugin definition

tables.name: Sites
tables.description: Stores information about websites or applications managed by the system

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the site

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the site

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the site

fields.name: Urls
fields.description: Comma-separated list of URLs associated with the site

fields.name: LayoutId
fields.description: Identifier for the default layout of the site

fields.name: DetailLayoutId
fields.description: Identifier for the detail page layout

fields.name: EditLayoutId
fields.description: Identifier for the edit page layout

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the site

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the site was created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the site

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the site was last modified

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the settings

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the settings

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the settings were created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the settings

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the settings were last modified

tables.name: SettingValues
tables.description: Stores individual setting values associated with settings configurations

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the setting value

fields.name: SettingsId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the associated settings configuration
constraints: FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES Settings(Id) ON DELETE CASCADE

fields.name: Key
fields.description: Key identifier for the setting value

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Value of the setting

tables.name: Users
tables.description: Stores user account information for authentication and authorization

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the user

fields.name: UserName
fields.description: Username for login

fields.name: NormalizedUserName
fields.description: Normalized version of the username for case-insensitive lookups

fields.name: Email
fields.description: Email address of the user

fields.name: NormalizedEmail
fields.description: Normalized version of the email for case-insensitive lookups

fields.name: EmailConfirmed
fields.description: Indicates if the user's email has been confirmed

fields.name: PasswordHash
fields.description: Hashed password for the user

fields.name: SecurityStamp
fields.description: Security stamp for tracking security-related changes

fields.name: ConcurrencyStamp
fields.description: Concurrency stamp for optimistic concurrency control

fields.name: PhoneNumber
fields.description: Phone number of the user

fields.name: PhoneNumberConfirmed
fields.description: Indicates if the user's phone number has been confirmed

fields.name: TwoFactorEnabled
fields.description: Indicates if two-factor authentication is enabled for the user

fields.name: LockoutEnd
fields.description: Date and time when the user lockout ends

fields.name: LockoutEnabled
fields.description: Indicates if user lockout is enabled

fields.name: AccessFailedCount
fields.description: Number of failed access attempts

fields.name: LoginAt
fields.description: Date and time of the last login

fields.name: LoginCount
fields.description: Total number of logins

fields.name: PasswordChangedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the password was last changed

fields.name: PasswordChangedBy
fields.description: User who last changed the password

fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: Indicates if the user account is enabled

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created this user account

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the user account was created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified this user account

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the user account was last modified

fields.name: AuthenticatorKey
fields.description: Key used for authenticator applications

fields.name: FirstName
fields.description: First name of the user

fields.name: LastName
fields.description: Last name of the user

tables.name: Roles
tables.description: Stores role definitions for access control within sites

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the role

fields.name: SiteId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the associated site
constraints: FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES Sites(Id) ON DELETE CASCADE

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the role

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the role

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Type of the role (represented as an enum value)

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the role

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the role was created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the role

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the role was last modified

tables.name: Folders
tables.description: Stores folder structures for organizing files within sites

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the folder

fields.name: SiteId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the associated site
constraints: FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES Sites(Id) ON DELETE CASCADE

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the folder

fields.name: NormalizedName
fields.description: Normalized name of the folder for case-insensitive lookups

fields.name: ParentId
fields.description: Identifier of the parent folder (for hierarchical structure)

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the folder

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the folder was created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the folder

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the folder was last modified

tables.name: Files
tables.description: Stores file information within the system

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the file

fields.name: SiteId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the associated site
constraints: FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES Sites(Id) ON DELETE CASCADE

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the file

fields.name: NormalizedName
fields.description: Normalized name of the file for case-insensitive lookups

fields.name: FolderId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the associated folder
constraints: FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES Folders(Id) ON DELETE CASCADE

fields.name: Extension
fields.description: File extension

fields.name: ContentType
fields.description: MIME type of the file

fields.name: Size
fields.description: Size of the file in bytes

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the file

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the file was created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the file

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the file was last modified

tables.name: Blocks
tables.description: Stores reusable content blocks for pages within sites

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the block

fields.name: SiteId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the associated site
constraints: FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES Sites(Id) ON DELETE CASCADE

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the block

fields.name: Category
fields.description: Category of the block

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the block

fields.name: Content
fields.description: Content of the block

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the block

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the block was created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the block

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the block was last modified

fields.name: Id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the page

fields.name: SiteId
fields.description: Foreign key referencing the associated site
constraints: FOREIGN KEY REFERENCES Sites(Id) ON DELETE CASCADE

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Title of the page

fields.name: ParentId
fields.description: Identifier of the parent page (for hierarchical structure)

fields.name: Order
fields.description: Display order of the page

fields.name: Path
fields.description: URL path of the page

fields.name: LayoutId
fields.description: Identifier for the layout used by this page

fields.name: EditLayoutId
fields.description: Identifier for the edit layout used by this page

fields.name: DetailLayoutId
fields.description: Identifier for the detail layout used by this page

fields.name: Locked
fields.description: Indicates if the page is locked from editing

fields.name: CreatedBy
fields.description: User who created the page

fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the page was created

fields.name: ModifiedBy
fields.description: User who last modified the page

fields.name: ModifiedAt
fields.description: Date and time when the page was last modified

notes: The database schema shows a well-structured content management system with clear separation of concerns. Key relationships include: ApiTokens to ApiTokenPolicies (1:N), PluginDefinitions to PluginDefinitionTypes (1:N), Sites as a central entity connecting to Roles, Folders, Files, Blocks, and Pages (1:N relationships), and Settings to SettingValues (1:N). The schema uses CHAR(36) for GUID primary keys consistently across all tables. Several tables have audit fields (CreatedBy, CreatedAt, ModifiedBy, ModifiedAt) which is good for tracking changes. Indexes are created on foreign keys and frequently queried columns. Some potential normalization issues include storing comma-separated values in GlobalSettings.SuperAdmins and Sites.Urls fields, which could be normalized into separate tables for better query performance and data integrity. The use of TINYINT(1) for boolean values is consistent throughout. All tables use InnoDB engine which supports foreign key constraints.
